(Simplified: 砗)
Chinese Definition:
①(硨磲)軟體動物，比蛤蜊大，有的長達一米，生活在熱帶海中，介殼略呈三角形，可做器物和裝飾品，肉可食。亦作“車渠”。
硨磲 [ chē qú ]: giant clam (Tridacna derasa)
(Simplified: 砗)

硨字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　硨； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页831第01
【廣韻】尺遮切【集韻】【正韻】昌遮切，?音車。【博雅】硨磲，石次玉。通作車渠。【?中記】車渠出天竺國。　【正字通】或讀若居，義同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Stone Character Department] 　砗; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 831 01
[Guang Yun] Ruler cover cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Chang cover cut, sound car. [Bo Ya] clam, Shi Ciyu. Pass as a car canal. [? Zhong Ji] Che Qu out of Tianzhu Kingdom.　【Zhengzitong】Or read Ruoju, with the same meaning.
